name: Groove (broomen, Will-Y)
description:
Go with the beat and groove!
Jumping on beat builds speed and a shield. Remember, red means dead. Avoid the red hazards by using your shield or moving out of the way of them. If you need a boost, jump into the barrier for big air.

Song credit: End of Line - Daft Punk, Never Gonna Give You Up- Rick Astley

Slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1U6OeWFJc1kBzRs9iqz13l4YAkq9nMwTXuPCzx-fC...
